about_the_game:
As a power hungry adventurer you set out to the forgotten dungeons to test both your might and your luck. Treacherous enemies, dangerous traps and ever changing dungeon floors are all out to stop you in your tracks. Do you have what it takes to make it out alive again and again?

The dungeons are full of loot, enemies and greedy shopkeepers. Gather enough wealth to acquire stronger weapons and abilities to take on harder dungeons with even better loot.

Key features:

  • Dynamically generated dungeons
  • Different objectives for dungeon floors
  • Fight over 8 different enemies!
  • Slay your foes with over 10 unique weapons!
  • Mix and match special abilities!
  • Secret rooms, if you have a keen eye
  • Grow stronger by completing sequences of dungeon floors without dying
  • Perish and lose everything you have gained, be careful!

short_description: Kerker is a procedurally generated dungeon crawler FPS roguelike that challenges the player with its varying cast of enemies, exclusive weapons and different dungeon types. Fight your way to riches by slaying foes, obtaining/combining unique abilities and finding forgotten treasures.
